layman_description: A cargo box holding automobile parts and engine components.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to passngasCrate for passenger vehicle loot distribution.
player_impact: Searching these crates in garages and gas stations can yield useful car parts for vehicles and upgrades.

layman_description: A sturdy cardboard box filled with building materials and tools.
technical_description: Extends cntCardboardBox with LootList set to constructionCrate for builder resource distribution.
player_impact: Finding these boxes in warehouses provides construction materials like wood planks, nails, and basic tools.

layman_description: A hidden treasure crate containing valuable loot and rare items.
technical_description: Extends cntCardboardBox with LootList set to hiddenStash for premium tier loot generation.
player_impact: Discovering these rare crates rewards you with high-quality gear and valuable treasures.

layman_description: A sealed laboratory container with scientific equipment and chemicals.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to popnpillsCrate for pharmaceutical loot distribution.
player_impact: Opening these lab crates yields medical supplies, potions, and chemical ingredients for crafting.

layman_description: A box of modern electronic devices and power components.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to mopowerCrate for advanced electronics distribution.
player_impact: These crates offer electronics, circuits, and power parts needed for advanced crafting recipes.

layman_description: A weathered wooden crate from a rural hunting lodge.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to savageCountryCrate for outdoor survival loot.
player_impact: Looting these crates rewards you with weapons, ammunition, and survival gear from the wilderness.

layman_description: A cardboard box branded with a grocery store logo.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to shamwayCrate for food and beverage distribution.
player_impact: Finding these branded crates gives you food, drinks, and nutrition items to maintain your health.

layman_description: An ammunition and weapons container from a gun shop.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to shotgunMessiahCrate for ranged weapons loot.
player_impact: These crates contain firearms, ammunition, and gun parts for your combat arsenal.

layman_description: A toolbox-style crate containing industrial work equipment.
technical_description: Extends cntLootCrateBookstore with LootList set to workingStiffsCrate for labor-related resources.
player_impact: Opening these reveals tools, mechanical parts, and crafting materials for construction and repairs.

layman_description: A locked storage chest containing various hand and power tools.
technical_description: Extends cntLootWeapons with tinted dark green appearance and downgrade mechanic to insecure state.
player_impact: Breaking into these tool chests provides essential tools for farming, crafting, and construction work.

layman_description: A damaged open toolbox with exposed contents visible.
technical_description: Extends cntLootTools as degraded state with LootList set to toolTestLoot for testing purposes.
player_impact: These damaged boxes still contain useful tools but offer less valuable items than sealed containers.

layman_description: A reinforced steel container holding firearms and explosives.
technical_description: Parent class for weapon loot containers with metal construction and dark red tint coloring.
player_impact: These heavily secured storage chests contain the most powerful weapons and ammunition available.

layman_description: An open weapons rack with missing security features.
technical_description: Extends cntLootWeapons as degraded state with LootList set to weaponTestLoot for testing purposes.
player_impact: Damaged weapon containers still have useful firearms but with fewer valuable items than sealed ones.

layman_description: A large travel suitcase locked and ready to search.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumClosed with larger model variant and player-accessible placement options.
player_impact: These large suitcases often contain clothing, survival gear, and valuable personal items.

layman_description: A large travel suitcase with lid open and contents spilling out.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumOpen as open variant of large luggage container for visual distinction.
player_impact: Open large suitcases let you quickly spot items without spending time opening them.

layman_description: A development helper showing random contents from large suitcases.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumRandomLootHelper with large luggage icon for testing loot distributions.
player_impact: This utility item helps balance the types of rewards found in large luggage containers.

layman_description: A standard travel suitcase locked with possible items inside.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumOpen with Class set to Loot and LootList for luggage treasure generation.
player_impact: Searching these suitcases yields travel supplies, money, and random valuable items from travelers.

layman_description: A medium-sized travel suitcase with an open lid for easy viewing.
technical_description: Base luggage container with cloth material, terrain decoration properties, and water flow allowed.
player_impact: Finding open suitcases around the map reveals their contents quickly for efficient looting.

layman_description: A testing container displaying all possible loot from medium luggage.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumOpen with special dev properties for balancing luggage loot tables.
player_impact: This helper ensures that luggage containers offer consistent and balanced rewards.

layman_description: A collapsed stack of suitcases piled together and sealed.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumClosed with adjusted model offset for pile arrangement variant.
player_impact: These luggage piles mimic real disaster scenes with multiple suitcases worth searching together.

layman_description: A scattered pile of open suitcases and travel bags.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumOpen with model offset adjusted to create visual pile arrangement.
player_impact: Scattered luggage piles let you quickly scan multiple items from travelers caught off guard.

layman_description: A development tool for testing all loot types in luggage piles.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumRandomLootHelper with pile A specific configuration for variant testing.
player_impact: This ensures luggage piles contain proper item distributions matching scattered suitcase scenarios.

layman_description: Another arrangement of stacked and closed suitcases.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumClosed as second pile variant for visual arrangement diversity.
player_impact: Multiple pile arrangements provide different aesthetic layouts for varied exploration experiences.

layman_description: Another pile of open luggage and scattered travel bags.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumOpen as second pile variant for open arrangement alternatives.
player_impact: Various pile arrangements create more immersive and visually distinct looting scenarios.

layman_description: A testing tool for pile B luggage variant loot distribution.
technical_description: Extends cntLuggageMediumRandomLootHelper with pile B specific settings for alternative arrangement testing.
player_impact: Balanced loot across pile variants ensures consistent reward distribution across different luggage arrangements.
